DMB Trivia Mini-FAQ:

Q: Why does my score go down?
A: When anyone gets a question correct, the score for that question decreases. Everyone's score is recalculated periodically to use the new question scores.

Q: How are the question values calculated?
A: A question's value is calculated based on the number of times it has been correctly answered/skipped. The maxiumum point value for a quesiton is 1000 (hardest) and the minimum is 100 (easiest).

Q: Does using a hint penalize me?
A: Using a hint cuts the value you can earn for answering that question correct in half.

Q: Why are answers revealed?
A: The goal was to make a trivia game that would attempt to inspire people to seek out new DMB audio, stories, etc. By revealing the answer we feel the app is more than a test or a quiz. Hopefully it inspires people to get more interested in the band and their music.

Q: How many questions are there?
A: Over 1500 - More can be added without an application update so overtime the number will grow and questions about current tours/DMB news should be incorportated.

Q: What if I find an error in a question or a question that can't be answered?
A: Please report that issue to us @dmbtrivia or via email jaybtv5@gmail.com or choose Report Question from the menu.

Q: These questions are impossible - how do people know so much about DMB tours and dates?
A: The Dave Matthews Band allows live audio recording of their concerts which are then shared by tapers. DMB also provides realtime setlist information on their website during shows. There's a large community of fans who download/collect live audio recordings and/or also follow and discuss show setlists. If these questions prove difficult for most their score values will increase. See below for a few good fan websites that may help you follow upcoming DMB tours and or revist old shows and setlists.

Q: Who developed this game?
A: @jeffthefate (Coder) & @Copperpot5 (Audio/Question set).

Q: My friend/etc has an iPhone - is there an iPhone version coming soon?
A: We have no plans to develop an iphone version of "DMBTrivia" at this time for a variety of reasons.

Official DMB site for realtime setlist, merch, etc: www.dmband.com
DMB Setlists, Songs Statistics, Guest Information, etc: www.dmbalmanac.com
Free live/legal downloads of DMB audio recordings: www.dreamingtree.org
General forum discussion: www.antsmarching.org
MP3 rarity and tour highlights: www.dontburnthepig.org

Many rarities and highlights can also be found on YouTube.

Feel free to ask general DMB questions to @dmbtrivia as well. We're friendly and always looking to help fans find the DMB info/fan media they're looking for.

•Wrong answers DON'T subtract points
•Using a Hint cuts the possible score in half
•Your score is recalculated often and may decrease
•Global question score decreases for each correct answer
•Global question score increases for each Skip
•Maximum question value is 1000
•Minimum question value is 100
•This makes the harder questions worth more and the easy questions worth less
